reviews.text: Depending on the cook this place can good either good or poor.  Never something you want to say about a restaurant.  I have eaten here many times but with better options in Alamosa or surrounding towns we have given up eating here.

This Mexican Food restaurant is a favorite of the local people here. The food is prepared authentically and is absolutely delicious. The restaurant has recently changed locations and is now conveniently located next to our University. The staff is very friendly and the food is well priced. Great value! 
The owners have had years of experirnce, you can tell.
Very good Mexican food! Small, intimate  place with friendly service and great prices.
Really good I been eating at el charro for 50years
Love it there. They have some good Mexican food.
